question:
During a recent plane journey, you sat next to a businessman who owns a chain of restaurants. You talked to him and he suggested that you should contact him about a possible job in one of his restaurants.

Write a letter to the businessman. In your letter,

### remind him when and where you met

### tell him what kind of job you are interested in

### say why you think you would be suitable for the job
text: I hope this email finds you well. I made your acquaintance in one of my travel from California to Florida last January. During our flight, we talked very much about your business.

If you remember rightly, we reached  a provisional agreement to help your sales thrive in a way that you can extend your market to many other states. We discussed  some viable options. However, our flight time was not enough to consider all the possibilities. One of the best solutions was to improve your marketing. Therefore, I am so interested in joining your marketing team.

I have a bachelor in business management and many years of experience in advertising. Moreover, I know some well-known advertising companies, which can give us some advice about our goal. Hence, I can definitely help your team to attract much of your market audience.
Looking forward to hearing from you.
